header.title: Claude Code Guide

intro.title: Before You Start
intro.subtitle: Please check the following items before installing Claude Code:

requirements.claudePro: Claude Pro Account - Pro plan ($20/month) subscription required
requirements.time: About 30 minutes - for complete installation and setup

mac.title: Terminal Usage Guide
mac.description: Terminal is a program that controls your computer by entering commands.
methods: Press Command (Cmd) âŒ˜ + Space and type "terminal"

windows.title: Command Prompt Usage Guide
windows.description: Command Prompt is a program that controls your computer by entering commands.
methods: Search for "Command Prompt" in Start menu
